p: The traditional use of medicinal plants as natural remedies against various pathologies has received full attention from the scientific community. In the last few decades, herbal medicines have been extensively used to fight diseases worldwide due to their efficiency, low costs, and few side effects [ 1]. Plants contain an immense variety of bioactive molecules for therapeutic, agri-food, and cosmetic uses [ 2]. For many years, medicinal plants have been considered a promising source of essential raw material for the discovery of natural compounds that are used as subsequent drugs to fight ailments [ 3].
